enabled.$description: References semantic attention status background color, Enabled state.

disabled.$description: Disabled attention badge background color using status disabled tokens for semantic consistency.

enabled.$description: References semantic info status background color, Enabled state.

disabled.$description: Disabled info badge background color using status disabled tokens for semantic consistency.

enabled.$description: References semantic critical status background color, Enabled state.

disabled.$description: Disabled critical badge background color using status disabled tokens for semantic consistency.

enabled.$description: References semantic resolved status background color, Enabled state.

disabled.$description: Disabled resolved badge background color using status disabled tokens for semantic consistency.

enabled.$description: Maximum contrast text color for info badge in enabled state.

disabled.$description: Maximum contrast disabled info badge text color for consistency with badge design pattern.

enabled.$description: Maximum contrast text color for attention badge in enabled state.

disabled.$description: Maximum contrast disabled attention badge text color for consistency with badge design pattern.

enabled.$description: Maximum contrast text color for critical badge in enabled state.

disabled.$description: Maximum contrast disabled critical badge text color for consistency with badge design pattern.

enabled.$description: Maximum contrast text color for resolved badge in enabled state.

disabled.$description: Maximum contrast disabled resolved badge text color for consistency with badge design pattern.

sm.$description: Horizontal padding of small size badge (4px). Absolute minimum for compact display.

lg.$description: Horizontal padding of large size badge (4px). Minimal spacing for consistency.

sm.$description: Vertical padding of small size badge (4px). Absolute minimum for compact display.

lg.$description: Vertical padding of large size badge (4px). Minimal spacing for consistency.

sm.$description: Max width of small badge (16px - standard icon size)

lg.$description: Max width of large badge (48px - XL surface size)

sm.$description: Minimal width of small badge (16px - makes badge round)

lg.$description: Minimal width of large badge (20px - makes badge round)

sm.$description: Height of small badge (16px - makes badge round)

lg.$description: Height of large badge (20px - makes badge round)

badge_label.$description: Strong font weight for optimal scannability.
